content.detailedDescription: I was attending a wedding reception in east seatauket, ny on sunday august 25, 2013. the time was approximately 9 pm eastern. at the time of the sighting i was outside, it was very dark with little lighting beyond the deck area. there is a small airport to the east of the sighting location. the flight path runs from north to south and one can observe the planes on part of their approach approximately a mile or so away. they were clearly not the source of the light that i observed. i observed a red ball of light approaching from the east, the direction of the airport. i and some of the other people there expressed the thought that it was a plane. while the others turned away i continued to watch as the object, about the size of a dime from my vantage point, as it approached and passed by. it was about 500 or so feet in the air, no sound (if it was a plane i was close enough that i would have heard it), no pulsating or strobe like effect. the flight path was a straight line. there was not trail or debris coming from the object. it was, all in all, a rather non-nonchalant sighting. just another red object of unknown origin passing by in the night sky. i continued to watch it as it disappeared in the distance. i seemed to be the only one interested in what it was and where it came from. i was not intoxicated at the time.
content.summary: I observed a red orb of unknown origin pass across the sky from my right to left.

content.detailedDescription:
Arrived home 10:30pm july 29 2013, exiting car in driveway, clear dark country skies, noticed the huge (football field size) triangle over-flying residence, north-bound.  steady speed 30mph, straight track.  constant altitude about 1500-feet.   hollered to husband to come outside, did not think of camera.

quiet country location, carefully listened - zero sound emitted.   red flashing lights each corner (3), each seemed the size of car headlight - instant-on/off flashing.  no center light/structure.

as triangle gained distance, the "far" red light disappeared, apparently obstructed by triangle body.   triangle continued steady-speed northbound until out of sight, several minutes clear viewing time.    perfect triangle shape and size remained exact.

did not notice if "transparent" or obscuring stars - did not pass in front of any significantly bright stars to attract attention to this.   feeling is - solid definite craft structure.

latitude: +46.1835

longitude: -117.2694
content.summary: Large triangle noticed over home, altitude 1500 feet, northbound 30mph, silent, 3 red flashing lights in corners 8 inches diameter

content.detailedDescription: Around 10:20 p.M. i happened to be on the roof of a local college for an observational astronomy class and we were observing the sky through our telescopes.  all of a sudden, one of my classmates sees something unusual in the south/southwestern part of the sky and we decided to take a closer look at it.  when we got the object in the field of view and focused on it, we saw quite an amazing and unusual object.  this was no star!  i looked at it for a few minutes through the eyepiece and i could see a sharp array of colorful lights flashing and some that were stationary in this disk-like object.  it appeared as a circle or disk of green, red, yellow, and orange lights which flashed like a disco ball that didn't rotate.  from a naked eye perspective this object appears just like any other star in the sky, the only reason we looked at was the color was redder than most stars and it was about as bright as the brightest stars.  in the eyepiece this object was a little larger than a normal star, it had to be an enormous distance out in the sky maybe even above the atmosphere of the earth.  we had to leave around 10:45 p.M. but the object was still there in the same part of the sky and didn't move much.  i asked my astronomy professor to look at it and he said it was not a star and dismissed it as a blimp or helicopter.  i don't think he would actually believe it was something otherwise but we knew better.  again half of the object was giving off very sharp rays of lights in sequence and the other half were fuzzy and stationary.  it must have been giving off a lot of energy at that great distance possibly out over the pacific ocean.
content.summary: Astronomy class sees colorful disco light object in sky - not a star!!!

content.detailedDescription:
I took my son 9, & grandsons 8 & 12 to dinner in brooksville fl, on hwy 41 @ the golden coral. as we pulled out of the parking lot, 1 child noticed it.  it was so bright & low, just sitting there, it caught his attention. we all started guessing what it could be, each was ruled out. plane,- no blinking lights, they don't hover, that low we'd of heard it, & it would of been long gone. helicopter,  no again, stayed too long, no noise, that low we could identify that.  satellite, no, it would not appear to move & wouldn't be so low.  this was a large kind of egg shaped, very bright white star type thing, w like spikes  of white light appearing to come out in different directions on the bottom.  we noticed it wasn���t ���going anywhere���,  as i drove we noticed it appeared to follow as i drove south on hwy 41.  each red light i stopped, it stopped.  we looked at it using the wires on telephone poles & tree tops to mark its spot,  waiting for it to go beyond the points, but it didn���t,  till id drive.  i turned west on wiscon rd & it did too.  it stayed to the right.  i turned south on california, it did.  i stopped 4 times on california street for up to 15 mins waiting for it to move with my car stopped.  it didn���t go anywhere.  i pulled out my cell phone.  it was hard to see looking at the screen, we took pictures & video  on the highest zoom, but they do not look as bright or big as it did.  with our eyes it appeared still, while looking at the camera/video screen, it appeared to shake up & down a bit.  i turned west on spring hill drive,  now we entered the city area with more cars & businesses.  it started going back & forth crossing the road a couple times.  then we turned south on mariner.  again it crossed the road a couple times, & started moving further from us.   all this time it went along as slow or fast as i drove, stopping when i stopped.
when i turned east to go to my older sons home, it hovered a bit, then we lost sight of it.  i stopped, btu we didn���t see it anymore.  tonight it was cloudy at that time, in that area, with barely any stars seen.  this object was lower than the clouds.  we kept wondering if anyone else saw it or felt they too were being followed.  the drive was about 15 to 18 miles.   because i stopped  to watch, it took us just under/over an hour.  
the kids were saying they were scared,  yet we were all intrigued, curious, wanting a concrete answer.  all 4 wanted to stop  & what to see what it did.  all had, have a strange feeling, like was it? could it be?  really? aliens? why?  why the cat & mouse game?  now it���s late & i am nervous.  i need to sleep to work in the am.  but am nervous, not knowing what happened, what will happen etc. 
i have 3 pictures & two videos.  which don't seem to show it well.  also my son & grandson took the video with the car window open  & the wind noise is loud. we all swear we took more pictures, but they are not on my phone. i guess they didn't save. the file #s aren't even in order, which is strange too.
content.summary: Seen bvy 4 of us, while driving 15 miles home.  it stopped when i did, moved when i drove, appeared to follow.

content.detailedDescription: I picked up my friend at st. louis's lambert airport last night, 28.Aug.2013. she arrived on southwest 636 from detroit at 8:00pm. i let her drive and right as we were leaving the airport heading towards i-70 west, under a dark-blue sky that wasn't showing any stars yet, i noticed a bright white star-like light southwest of my field of vision. i asked my friend "hey, does that light look like a star to you?", as i pointed towrds the light. she said "no, it's rather large -- what the heck kind of plane is that taking off?!" i looked to the right of the light i was looking at attentively, and i saw under the darkening sky a fighter plane taking off from the airport's tarmac, racing up and towards the left, heading soutwest towards the bright light in the sky, followed by another fighter plane. it was dark, i'm guessing these were two f-15s. no flood lights in either fighter, just red flashing lights under their bellies, both f-15s heading towards the light in the sky fast. i tried hard not to lose track of the fighter planes or their flashing lights as they disappeared in the distance, always heading towards the light in the sky, but i couldn't follow them for more than a few seconds. first i stopped hearing their roaring engines, then i stopped seeing their bodies, and lastly their flashing red lights. gone, just like that. my friend takes i-70 west towards lake saint louis, past the bridge over the missouri river. for about ten minutes after the fighter planes i kept my eyes trained on the bright light in the sky until it was no longer southwest of my field of vision but rather to the south, and lastly southeast of our moving car's vantage point. the light never moved from the original position where it was as we were leaving the airport and saw the scrambling f-15s. i lost track of the light in the sky when my friend exited i-70 to look for the address where she was going to pick up her dog.
content.summary: Large white bright star-like light.

content.detailedDescription: A flash of light much larger than any star. lasted just a second. then a few seconds later a smaller flash a few degrees lower toward the horizon. there was a large thin cloud where this took place. in partly cloudy skies.I have seen flashes before but never this large. i watch the skies often.
content.summary: A flash of light much larger than any star.

content.detailedDescription: Our neighbors told us about a sighting in the area on aug. 3/4th. four individuals observed it. a rounded shaped or oval object with pulsating white lights. tonight at around 8:30 pm. our family was driving down 138 west in the area where we live and saw this pyramid shaped brightly lit object hovering. we watched it since there are planes that fly overhead toward ont. airport and we have helicopters at times as well as other aircraft from edwards on occasion. this was not like anything we ever saw before with its intense bright lights with red lights more at the top. this did not move but hovered above the ridge for about 30 min. and then descended behind the ridge. during the episode we called one of our neighbors and asked her to go outside and tell us if that is what she observed earlier in the month. she said yes it was. we are hoping others will report it so we will learn more about it.
content.summary: Driving down hyw 138 west and saw hovering pyramidal object very bright about 1+-3 miles away for about 20min.

content.detailedDescription: I came back from the airport at 9:17 pm mst.  i glanced up and saw an object the color of a campfire.  circular in size and bright, i initially thought it was an aircraft at altitude on fire.  however the object stopped, hovered, and changed direction several times illustrating a very erratic flight profile.  the object was initially traveling southeast and eventually changed its direction to due east disappearing into a cloud.  at the time of the sighting visibility was 10 miles, wind 310 at 3, few clouds at 7,500, scattered at 12,500, temp. 23 c, dew point 12 c, density altitude 5400, and altimeter 3002.  consequently, based on this aviation weather report of 0339 zulu for billings, mt, i would say the object upon initial sighting was at roughly 5000 agl and climbing eventually disappearing into scattered cumulus at 12,000 agl.  the object was the size of my thumbnail at first sighting and had traveled high enough/far enough away, that at last sighting, it was approximately twice as big as a star.  total sighting time was approximately 60 seconds. one photo was taken with my iphone which i put on the computer, enlarged, and then took another photo of the enlargement which i submitted.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright, glowing object-appeared to be on fire.

content.detailedDescription: This incident happened either late may or early june of 2013, as best as i can recall...I was driving home from work...Worked til close at 2200...And was out of work right at 2200...So this incident happened probably about 5 to 10 minutes after 2200...I always take the same route home...And i was driving pass our local mall which was closed for the night as well...I just happened to look upward in the sky and saw at first these three lights...I thought at first they were from a street light...There are street lights in the mall parking lot....But as i looked more i realized the lights were not coming from a street light....They were on the bottom of a figure that was triangular and black in color....There was a white dome light in each corner of the triangle figure....It made no sound and it was hovering...I kept on driving...I was the only car on that particular street....I thought about turning around and getting another look at the thing, but i was so tired from working that i decided against it....
content.summary: Large black triangular ufo sighted...

content.detailedDescription: While watching tv at 8:30 i saw a red light in the sky that was glowing. i went out to my porch and stared at it for a minute. i then got my phone to see if i could video it, but it seemed too high and too dark for me to video it on my iphone. when it reached directly above i went into the house and came out to see it on the south side of my apartment. i watched as the light faded into the atmosphere and disappeared. pretty sure it wasn't a plane because i am always looking at the night sky and know what most of them look like. i have very little emotional reaction other than some excitement to see what i saw.
content.summary: Glowing red light flying in a direct path due southeast. fuzzy outline.

content.detailedDescription: On friday august 23 i was called to attention of two objects hovering low in the sky. it resembled two black balloons, hovering 200 feet up. it was clear with some clouds and sunset was still somewhat off with not any breeze at ground level.I felt sure i could give it a positive id but had trouble with the way it maintained a perfect fixed point in hover. that fact became more puzzling as time went on. ten, twenty, thirty then forty minutes elapsed without the slightest waver not only in respect to  the ground but relative to the two objects being observed. it's stubborn motionlessness frustrated me. i called several people to confirm the sighting which they did from different points of view that many others witnessed at my location. one contact managed to observe it for about five minutes before it went on a very slow move. he was successful in chasing it until he got within 300 to 400 feet of ground zero. zero being the spot that the main object would be directly above. he gave a guess of 200 feet off the ground and moving  a running mans pace horizontally. descending to 100 feet before losing line of sight due to tree tops. it was black to the absolute degree. perfectly circular, with no surface feature. it felt hesitant to describe it to me this way but a gave an analogy. he said it was if their was a sharp and perfectly circular black hole was punched into the blue sky that made no sound. the second circle was the same description but smaller trailing behind the first by 30-50 feet and bobbling. a small black plane was spotted at 7:30 at 500 feet approx and traveling in the direction of the sighting. and again circling  which was confirmed by another witness from different location but maintaing near time cell phone contact.In addition , i observed two helicopters hovering over the location where object was last seen before moving out of my line of sight. this was five hours later at 1:00 am. three reasons that could explain away an over active imagination is follows1). local coast guard conducting business however you rarely observe a cg chopper unless in transit to harbor to or from harbor station "which is not at the babson resevoir and  i never saw two coastlines hovering together. no search lights and maintaing approx separation of 200 feet. 2). medical evac from omelet fields for boston hospital. not uncommon at all to hear and see civil medivac over this neighborhood especially because of close proximity to pickup point. being a resident of this neighborhood for 40 years, this nights helicopter activity was startling out of place. medivac a always come in low loud and do not circle or hover with complacency due to the obvious nature of life or death urgency .3). it could be a camera crew flight for footage of the gloucester based tv series "wicked tuna".
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Witnessed during 50 minutes in daylight by approximately 40 people from several view points. from a distance it appeared to be two black circular objects at perfect  hover then moved and descended. at close up it was described  as  a perfect circle, black

content.detailedDescription: My wife came in the house came inside saying i have to come see this so i went outside saw a blue electric/gas cloud with a ufo not too far from it. i took out my phone and started recording the object. then it paused and dropped an object out that trailed behind it, then paused. we also saw at the time it opened that it started to glow very bright and let out a weird gas like substances. the video is on my iphone couldn't zoom in but u can see the crafts and the glowing gas when it opens
content.summary: Came out of no where and it was a beautiful display of lights and mist

content.detailedDescription: Was in my back yard sky watching with my best friend using night vision goggles when we observed 4 ufo,s directly over my home and then turn and fly towards la california. we were able to record some of the event. adding footage to this report. we slowed the video down and you can also see another ufo pass over the other 4 at a very high rate of speed.We have been recording many ufo's in this area over the last thirty days.
content.summary: 4 ufos flying in a v formation passed over my home

content.detailedDescription:
Outside my windows, i noticed a rather tight triangle formation of 3 red lights in the east.  i have been to, at least, 2 dozen airshows so it was quite unusual for me to see a tight triangle formation of aircraft.  so, i went outside to see what type of airplane was flying, but i did not hear a sound.   the clouds were low and with a wind blowing in a ne direction about 10 mph ( gusts up to 22 according to my cell phone.  i sat and watched the triangle formation of lights become a string when all of a sudden the first light faded out.  now, it could have been the low clouds.  at least that is what my mind told me.  however, the next two lights also faded out at different spots in the sky.

so i thought "that was weird!" when i looked back to the east, i saw more of these red dots in the sky.  3... 4... 5... the numbers were growing.  they all were traveling east to northwest.  on average, it would take about a 2 minutes for this lights to go from the horizon to over head to out of sight.   i was actually, able to go into the house, grab my camera, tri-pod and my binoculars.  however, the pictures that i took are still blurry.  when i viewed the objects thru my binoculars, they appeared to be red rings.

all in all, counted at least 24 objects in the sky. all of which were dead quite.  in all, this viewing lasted about 20 minutes.
content.summary: A line of 24 flying objects heading from east to west

content.detailedDescription:
First heard a distant roar, walked outside to see a dark grey and black cloud about 3/4 mile to the east. moving towards me the sounds got louder
to the piont of hurting my ears, eyes stared burning and watering.
the tears ran down my face. felt like evrything was vibrating even when i touched a swingset in my backyard. cloud changed direction and turned south. head started hurting. cloud traveled south for aprox 1/2 mile then turned towards the west for maybe 300 yards then turned south and went off in the distance. as it went further away the noise and vibration faded. 
resulted in burning eyes, tearing up a lot, extreme headach and sick to my stomach. hole thing lasted aprox 20 minutes. 12:00noon to 12:20pm.
its now 9:50 pm and i still have a headach.
content.summary: Dark cloud moving, zig zaged, very loud, vibrated everthing, headach sick stomach watering burning eyes

content.detailedDescription: I was standing with my cousin by the road in our neighborhood.  to tell you the truth i dont remember how we got there or why we were standing there.  then i heard a sound. like current static pulsating sound.  i think we both looked up at the same time.  it was almost directly on top of us above us at least 50 feet. just above the power lines.  it was moving slow and the sound of current i not only saw but i could see the current flowing thru it. it appeared to be flat from where we were standing but as it moved away i could tell it was ball shaped. as it slowly moved over us it continued a path toward the mountain.  when it reached the top of the mountain. it seemed to turn and it appeared to change shape.  i observed wing like shapes on it as it turned as soon as it turned it took off like a rocket and dissappeared.  there were other people besides me and my cousin.  i remember seeing and hearing a few people standing on thier porch on the mountain side behind my house. it has been many years since i seen this but it is just like yesterday in my mind.  i will never forget what i saw and never believed in ufo until that evening.  whatever that was it was not from this earth.  i will never for it.  i was stunned felt overwhlmed but also so curious and could not take my eyes off that object.  it was so close to us
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Round ball orange and red with yellow like current all over it

content.detailedDescription: It was about 4 in the morning.  i had woken and had a very strange feeling that what i had experienced the four previous times i've reported was very close to being made available to my conscious mind.  i was both very relieved and very nervous. my residence is up a hill from the main road so no car lights would reflect into my window.  also, i heard no aircraft, helicopters over my home so there was no known source of the lights.  they left after a few short moments, but again, i had a residual feeling that i was very close to knowing, in real time and not shrouded in amnesiac memory, what was really going on.  and it felt okay.  the vision i had right after that was of an almost normal looking human but with a very bright light eminating from his right eye.  odd.
content.summary: Lights appeared out my bedroom window after experiencing memory of contact

content.detailedDescription:
It was approximately 1:00 a.M. on tuesday, august 28, 2013 in north tustin, orange county, california. i was sitting on my second floor outside balcony facing north.  i looked to the north east and noticed three hovering orange glowing orbs.  i thought that the orbs were either a ufo or chinese lanterns.

i went inside to get my husband to have another witness and when we went back outside the three orange orbs slowly decended in a southern direction.  we went back in the house to get our son and his two friends, who are 19 and 20 years old.  we all went outside and stood in the front yard and watched the orbs hover, while getting dimmer and brighter sporadically for approximately five minutes.  at one point, one of the orbs ejected what looked like a flare-like object.  my husband doesn't know if it flew away in a hortizontal direction or if it just disintegrated.  the 3 orbs all slowly disappeared.  the whole episode lasted about 15 minutes. 

i felt calm and scientific.  i wanted more witnesses so i went and got my family.  the boys were nervous, excited and a little scared.  they thought it was cool.  my husband stated that it was the first time that he actually felt like he saw a ufo.  he was astonished and curious.
content.summary: Orange glowing orbs hovering north east with a flare-like object dropping out of the orb.

content.detailedDescription: Viewer: ja estava noite, e eu estava pondo as roupas no varal e quando olhei pra cima vi uma luz muito pequena indo para o leste. n���o parecia avi���o, pois estava muito alto e a uma velocidade superior aos avi���es de voos intercontinentais. ent���o subi no apartamento e avisei minha esposa sobre a luz, fomo para a janela e l��� estava ela indo em dire������o ao continente, pois moramos em uma ilha, e logo estava vindo outra no sentido contr���rio, foi espet���cular, pois parecia que sabiam que est���vamos observando. tentamos registrar os avistamentos, mas nossa c���mera n���o tem um bom alcance de lente. o evento durou cerca de 8 a 10 minutos.
content.summary: Avistamento de dois ufos nos céus de florianópolis, brasil.

content.detailedDescription: Have been watching this thing dance around for months, this night it seemed brighter and more active than usual.  i set my camera, a pentax k-x 12.1 mp with a 135mm lens and a doubler (270 mm total) on the tripod and began shooting in bursts. the entire event lasted approx 9 minutes until i got spooked by strange noises from the woods in the direction of the object.  the attached photos are from the last 3 minutes of the sighting.  i have many and these are the best/strangest representations. the first photo is at 12:12 a.M. the other four are from 12:13
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Circle,   Diamond,   Disc,   Fireball,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: Erratic, glowing, shapeshifting "star" photos attached

content.detailedDescription: I woke up feeling slighty scared. i looked toward my open bedroom door and a human like figure stood in the doorway. it was as tall as the door and thin. i tried to wake up my girlfriend but she didn't move. it then came at me. the next thing i remember is waking up in bed in the morning with a cold sweat and some bruises which i think i got from fighting back. i was taken a few times when i was a child but my mother says i was dreaming yet i was wide awake. i know i'm not crazy and scared it might happen again. sometimes i wake up in the morning with bruises that i did not have when i went to bed and family and my girlfriend have noticed the bruises.
content.summary: It came into my room and took me

content.detailedDescription: I was flying from houston to seattle. my mother randomly said what's that son? (in reality she used my name) i looked out of the window and saw a cigar shaped object less than a mile away flying the opposite direction. i was only able to see it for about 8 seconds but got a very good look at it because it was very close. i calculated the speed based on a cloud that we were passing (my plane was traveling at 430 mph at 34000 ft.) the object was just on my side of that cloud  the speed i estimated to be around 1600 mph. it was traveling south by south east. there were no wings, no rotors, no extremities what so ever. it was grey, flying straight, was definitely not a conventional air craft. it was about 1.5 hours into the flight which puts the sighting around the north east corner of new mexico. it was about 10 degrees looking down from my window. probably less than that. the viewable distance was unlimited with few clouds beneath. quite a beautiful day until we got closer to seattle. i lost sight of the object due to the viewing angle of the window. i was excited to see this as i know what i saw.
content.summary: In flight visual out of plane window

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on my deck.  the house is situated on the edge of a cliff, atop a drying river bed.  i saw a pulsing, multicolored light in the sky across the river.  i see these same lights every night, and recently bought binoculars because of it.  anytime i try to get a closer look, they are always too far away to really see what they are.  last night when i looked through the binoculars, they were close enough to make out the detail.  i saw the first one, and through the binoculars, you could see that it was stationary.  it was perfectly round.  it had black specs all over it, and was pulsing with light from the inside.  the color would change every time it pulsed.  i took the binoculars away from my eyes, and scanned the rest of the sky.  i noticed another one on the far left side of the sky, and it was moving.  i looked through the binoculars, to make sure it wasn't a plane.  it was the exact same thing as the other one, only brighter and moving.  it moved fast enough to cross the entire sky in about 10-15 seconds, but slow enough for me to follow it looking through the binoculars.  it flew right by the stationary one, very close.  as i was watching that, i noticed about 8 others in the background.  they were solid white, much dimmer, stationary and not pulsing.  i continued to observe them, then stepped inside for a moment.  when i walked back outside, they were not in the sky at all.  i saw a very bright, white light across the river.  i thought maybe it was a car driving through the gated, yet very country community across the river.  i watched it for a moment and it didn't move and it was so bright.  so i looked through the binoculars, and to my amazement and horror, it was one of those things i had just seen in the sky.  it was very large and very bright.  it had black specs all over it and was lighting up the trees with its glowing.  it looked like a star, radiating light like the sun.  it looked like a giant ball of white, glowing energy with black specs all over it.  i woke my husband up to be a witness to it.  we could see groups of trees around it lighting up with, what appeared to be smaller glowing orbs beneath the treeline (much smaller ones).  once my husband got a good look at the big one through the binoculars, it's light shut off.  we could no longer see it, but the other groups of trees continued to stay lit up for a while.  they gradually dimmed out as well.  the experience was exhilerating, but actually terrifying as well.  i was texting the whole time to my friend in houston, and that's why i know the exact time of everything.  even though i was using my phone, i didn't think to take a picture.  although, my phone isn't a very good one and i don't know that anyone would have been able to see anything in a picture from it.  i was simply terrified.  i was shaking and didn't think about anything except what i was looking at, along with telling someone.  i do see these lights at some distance, every night.  so, i plan to set myself up with a telescope and good camera for future evidence.  i felt a sense of duty to let someone know what i saw.  it did not look like it was of this world.  i'm hoping for answers or validation.  they had no sound that i could hear, but while inside, my dog sensed their presence.
content.summary: Saw one flying, and many others stationary. later saw same objects in trees, right across the river from my house.

content.detailedDescription: 4 hovering lights appeared to be 100-500 ft above the nys thruway, with another to the east and above them, in a ragged formation. they seemed to be spread about as wide as the thruway. we noticed them dimly about ten degrees above the horizon; they appeared stationary as we passed beneath them. from first noticing them to going under them was less than 15 seconds, so i had no time to pull out my camera. it was deep twilight with heavy overcast (started to rain later). they were about as bright as venus would be. the light was slightly yellowish but not big enough to see any detail (point source), and was broadly omnidirectional. they did not blink or vary in intensity. no structures were observed. i did not look out the rear window to see if they were back there as we left.
content.summary: Hovering lights

content.detailedDescription: The object appeared to move slowly almost with a slight bounce to it,moved a top the tree line. with only the cold red which was very bright. outdated no flash. no sound. continued to fly out of sight at the same height. when almost out of sight i noticed in my peripheral view an object come straight up from center of tree line which started to follow same path but object was more star like than an object or disc shape like the first one. couldn't see first objects shape unroll it hit a little light then almost positive i saw disc shape. lasted five minutes
content.summary: Pulled on side of road on way back to my boyfriends house because we both saw a very very bright deep red pulsating light coming from an object

content.detailedDescription: I was out on my porch talking on the phone and then when i hung up, i look ed up at my sky at which time i saw nothing, i always look at my sky weather its day or not i love to look at my sky considering i moved here to pennsylvania two years ago from nyc where you can never see any stars at night or anything due to the pollution and lights. so that was one thing that i appreciated about my new clear night sky and the abundance of stars are amazing. some nights between the moon and stars i don`t even need a light to see outside even though its rural where i live and there are no streetlights which leaves it pitch black only to be lit by house lights car lights and planes, helicopters or lightning.I love it...So last night august 27 2013 after my call, i was looking at the sky from my front step through the top of the trees about 100 foot or so maybe more or less as i did not  measure it, but as i was looking up through the top of the trees directly wait for this tiny red light to start blinking and the second think was i don`t see any whites or greens flashing either indicating a plain or helicopter or even a single engine plain, i see these all maybe like the size of a my truck tire, again my best estimation. but it was not just the orb being red it had a glow almost a burn, maybe plasma and around this orb there was an orange hue like an aura. then the object in my full view it split apart forming three perfect little orbs with the same awe shocking colors. so as soon as the split they formed a little triangle and then it started to spin around and then while still triangular it started to spin in the opposite direction, then they started to go vertical and it looked like the did some sort of a waltz or gymnastics almost playing with each other, at this time i was stunned at what i was witnessing they became the little triangle orbs and started moving right and in less than a nanosecond it morphed back into its original form and moved to the right, at which time clearly nervous i took out my cell phone to rec it so i had to look away look down at my phone i pressed the camera button and it was on camera so i had to switch it to video so i held it up and all i could see was complete darkness nothing at all, so i put my phone away the orb there floating away now i go in my house grab my cannon i got it ran out of my house the orb still moving further away and as soon as i pushed the power button it i looked at the orb and as i looked at the orb it just vanished, gone, right into thin air. i got not no photo of the orb but the photo i did get was black with a little light of my floor or walk way lights meaning as soon as it vanished. i must have been starting to lift my right arm going to take the pic and instinctively snapped the shot as soon as my eyes saw it vanish grrr. so no i have no evidence but it does show that i was out side at the specified time and was trying to take a photo. never saw on before but always believed in them. i hope some one from mufon can contact me concerning things about certain events never being covered, lies, evidence  and statements and footage and articles that an alien voice not noise  explosions space junk colliding, you can actually listen to the voice anywhere youtube online. and the best is if a guy predicts an ex air force and norad guy that on oct 13 2010 aliens will show them selves over major cities, then it actually happens impossible, look at nyc on that date on youtube oct 13 2010 ufo or google it. i lived and worked in manhattan at that time and i never saw any of the news footage on the news that was on youtube i was shocked i almost felt robbed, cbs 2 news had a camera on these ufos for 8 mins and the were also there at night on a night content.detailedDescription: On the night of august 27, 2013 my boyfriend and i were watching local nightly news in our bedroom. my boyfriend had turned off the tv before 11:30 pm. we talked for just a moment and then settled in bed to sleep. he falls asleep rather quickly and normally i toss and turn for a while until i get comfortable. strangely after 20 - 25 minutes i was still not able to get comfortable to rest. i sat up and dangled my legs from the edge of the bed, i felt sick to my stomach and hot. at about 12:05 am (now 8/28/13)i walked from our bedroom to the bathroom. as i approached my sink, right away i noticed a rather large light illuminating the sky outside the window above my sink (towards the eastern sky). it was football shaped and looked like reflective red-orange light like from a sunset or something. the sky all around was clear and very dark. this light looked as though it was right over the tree line that's in our backyard - (the object would have been about 45 degrees from the ground. the bright object was extremely noticeable, and my first thought was "wow, the moon looks quite unusual tonight, never seen it do that..". again the shape of it at first glance was blimp-like or football shaped. it did not glow or have a haze around it, nor a beam of light, everything outside was pitch black and the sky was clear - again it was not hazy or anything. i continued to stand there for a moment beguiled of its brilliance. then turned a few steps and used the toilet facilities. then is less than a minute later when i was looking at it while washing my hands at the sink, i noticed that the object changed shape right before my eyes (i witnessed real shape shifting); it appeared to widen slightly and then curved and rounded more at the top center. at this point in time, i was at a loss of words and felt eerie. now, i didn't feel like it was the moon anymore and i didn't think that this could be a strange solar reflection of some kind or some rare astral alignment. then about 30 seconds later the object started to implode at a steady pace right before my eyes (darkness was evenly absorbing the entire outside of the object). at this point when the object was about 40% smaller, i yelled for my boyfriend to come quickly. by the time he got to the window it was the size of a pencil eraser in the sky, and in a flash is was completely gone like - poof, complete darkness.
content.summary: Witnessed a large 'reflective' red-orange football shaped object in the clear night sky. after 1 minute the object changed shape, then suddenly imploded at a fast pace and disapeared.

content.detailedDescription: It came over me and my home. then set its self in a tree top. to dark to see where it went after the sounds stopped coming from the tree. it was something that could be man made but i'm not sure.
content.summary: Call and we can chat, this is the third time in two years i am reporting somethin. i have no fear of this i just wish to understand what is going on..!

content.detailedDescription:
While camping in northern michigan, i was viewing the stars with my night vision scope. between the hours of midnight and 1:00 am, every time i looked up i saw a light about as bright as a dim star maneuvering outside of normal parameters.
when i looked up, it took at most about 1 minute for something out of the ordinary to appear. here are a few of the accounts:

i saw a steady light enter from the south and exit to the north. its intensity was approximately as bright as an average background star. the speed was slightly slower than a typical meteorite, but didn't get bright as a meteor would burning up in our atmosphere. it took less than 3 seconds to traverse the visible sky. it's path was perfectly straight and did not appear to have any internal motion indicative of a low flying bird. it did not have strobe lights like an airplane would, pulsate like a tumbling satellite, or change intensity like a meteor would. i saw this similar scenario 3 times over the next hour. given its speed, it would be reasonable to assume the other events were the of same object - as i didn't note the direction of the other two instances.

a light resembling a star entered my field of view from the north with a constant speed on a direct southerly heading. the speed was approximately 3 times faster than a satellite. the elevation at which i first observed it was approximately 60 degrees. when it was still about 80 degrees to the north, its speed dropped in half and the path then became erratic for a few seconds, while still maintaining a southerly heading. then, without slowing down at all, it took an immediate left turn to the east while maintaining a constant speed and resumed a steady, non erratic path out of my view to the east.

a light that looked like a star was covering around large portions of the sky very quickly. it did not travel in a straight line, but was turning left and right, curving around the visible sky for over a minute. its speed appeared to be somewhere around 10 times faster than a satellite. it was a steady light, did not pulsate, strobe or change in intensity. i watched it for at least a minute until it took a straight path to the west out of view.

a light that looked like a star was maneuvering quickly at about 80 degrees above me to the south-west. i had a green laser that i was using to determine if it was close enough to be illuminated if it was a bug. the object seemed to actively avoid my light as i tried to light it up. after about 30 seconds, it faded out of sight. i then turned off the laser and adjusted the gain on my scope to see if i could find it again. i then saw a bright flash from where it disappeared and it then faded back into view. after its intensity returned to what it was before, it then exited the area on a perfectly straight path to the west.

given that these objects danced around then left the area, it is possible that several of the instances were the same object coming back in to my field of view. also, since i was camping, i did observe some ashes ascending from time to time when the wind pushed them over my position. these ashes were visibly blurry as they were within a few hundred feet of me and all acted similar as they drifted upward.
content.summary: Multiple atmospheric anomalies

content.detailedDescription: It was 3am i was asleep in my bed.I suddenly awoke.There was an extremely bright light emanating through my bedroom window blinds.I got out of bed and went towards the blinds with the intention of finding out what was causing the light and the incredibly loud noise which sounded like a giant generator.I found i was too scared to open the blind which is unusual for me,being a naturally inquistive person.The last thing i remember is standing to the side of the window.Whats really strange is that i then forgot all about it.Months later it popped back into my mind and i realized that i dont remember going back to bed that night and i never resolved the situation.I also had a strange dream.In it i am laid on a raised table.Someone or something is beside me by my hip area.I am paralized but conscious.I am absolutely terrified as whatever procedure isgoing to be done is about to start.Then i hear a voice that says stop shes terrified.Out of my peripheral vision i can see a woman.She looks very human except for her high forehead and bluish tinge to her skin.She communicated psychicly.I asked why me? and was told it is because im special.Im sure a psychologist would have something to say about that and ive agonised about whether i should just keep quiet for fear of ridicule. what is also strange is the fact that there were chinook helicopters hovering over our estate before and after this event which were seen by many locals.Through my life aged 4,15,32,and 45 i have had dreams of a similar type.Now im wondering if they were more than that.
content.summary: Extremely bright light,extremely loud noise like a generator streaming through bedroom window,chinooks in area b4 & after
